pullRequest.title: Addition of functionalities about redstone
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description

This simple little PR adds an expression to recover the redstone power of a block and a condition to check if a block is powered by redstone.

Target Minecraft Versions: any 
Requirements: none 
Related Issues: #3090

commit.message: ExprBlockPower - Expression for recovering redstone power from a block.

nodes.bodyText: You are missing docs here. This should include the name (name of the expression), description (describe what this expression does), examples (a few examples showing how this works) and version ("INSERT VERSION" <-- that should be used, we replace this later during release)

nodes.bodyText: to prevent problems, you should user Number here and in the generic but otherwise the PR looks good

You can make it take multiple blocks just by making the type plural (so, "blocks") in the property expression, Skript handles the rest.
Also, the name might be too generic, I'd rather use redstone power since other expressions that use the word power may have conflicts.
